灈字的基本解释

灈
qú
〔灈水〕今中国河南省遂平县石羊河的古称。

灈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qú］
［《廣韻》其俱切，平虞，羣。］
古水名。即今河南省遂平县石羊河。源出县西北，东南流至县东注入瀙水（即今沙河）。

灈字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　灈； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页662第22
【唐韻】其俱切【集韻】【韻會】權俱切，?音衢。水名。【水經】灈水，出汝南吳房縣西北興山。【後漢·吳漢傳】二十八年，封成子旦爲灈陽侯。【註】灈陽，縣名，屬汝南郡。

灈
Basic explanation of words
灈
qú
〔灈水〕The ancient name of Shiyang River in Suiping County, Henan Province, China.
灈
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qú］
["Guangyun" all cut, Pingyu, group. ]
Ancient water name. Now Shiyang River, Suiping County, Henan Province. The source flows from the northwest of the county and flows from the southeast to the east of the county to inject Huangshui (now Shahe).
灈
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Shui Zi Department] 　灈; Kangxi strokes: 22; Page number: page 662 22
[Tang Yun] Its all cuts [Ji Yun] [Rhymes] The right all cuts,? Yinqu. Water name. 【Shui Jing】Aoshui, out of Xingshan in the northwest of Wufang County, Runan. [The Story of the Later Han·Wu Han] In twenty-eight years, Cheng Zidan was named the Hou Yang Hou. [Note] Yaoyang, the county name, belongs to Runan County.
